name: Textmate Snippets
body:
## Tab Triggers * `li+a` (HTML) expands into a `
    • ` block * `lin` (HTML) expands into a `
    • ` block (useful for list navigations) * `/c` (HTML) expands into a `` comment (useful for ending id/class groups) * `reset` (CSS) expands into a CSS reset block I've become accustomed to using * `gradient` (CSS) expands into an Internet Explorer, Safari, and Firefox friendly CSS-Gradient syntax (and falls back gracefully) * `jp` (Javascript) expands into a best practices jQuery plugin. ## Command Triggers * `Cmd+Shift+H` (CSS) expands selected text into a comment heading ## Want it all? Download the zip and install Kyle's Stuff.bundle.
tagline: A collection of snippets I find useful
